casebody.data:
A&F TRADEMARK
v.
TOLSON. No. 23P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Sean E. Andrussier, Raleigh, Paul H. Frankel, Hollis L. Hyans, Amy F. Nogid, New York, NY, for A&F Trademark, et al. Kay Lynn Miller Hobart, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of January 2005 by Amici for Leave to File Memorandum of Amici Curiae:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
